text:
Longshot Systems, London, UK.

Web scraping / data manager role. Â£30-50k depending on experience. This is not a traditional job offer, it's an offer to join our gambling syndicate, your pay will be a fraction of syndicate winnings. We need general familiarity with web tech, scripting languages, databases (we use postgres/mysql currently) and getting stuff done.

Hit me up on david@longshotsystems.co.uk to apply.
